Name: God of the Arena Dungeon
About the game: GotAD is a PvPvE arena twin-stick shooter that features: Hectic PvPvE with unique non-instanced dungeon bosses Extensive class tree system culminating in 16+ different endgame classes Boasts team modes with unique class interaction Items and specializations allow for build customization Ever-expanding maps and game modes BOT SUPPORT! Destroy arena vermin, level up, choose your class path, get loot, and slay other players. Destroy the bosses of the arena without being slain, and perhaps your ascent into arena God-hood will be recorded into legend! Join the Discord with the following after the backslash: dsNAkTx
